NetworkAffinity.name: NetworkAffinity
NetworkAffinity.description: Represents a junction object that associates a user profile with a Network object, that is, with an Experience Cloud site. Use NetworkAffinity to assign a default Experience Cloud site to a user profile.

NetworkId.description: The ID of the default Experience Cloud site associated with a user profile.

ProfileId.description: ID of the user profile the default Experience Cloud site is assigned to.
